ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_resubdrg | |- ( RR e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) /\ RRfld e. DivRing ) |

| 3 |  | #P_df-refld | |- RRfld = ( CCfld |`s RR ) |
| 4 |  | #P_cncrng | |- CCfld e. CRing |
| 5 | 1 | #P_simpli | |- RR e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( CCfld |`s RR ) = ( CCfld |`s RR ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_subrgcrng | |- ( ( CCfld e. CRing /\ RR e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) -> ( CCfld |`s RR ) e. CRing ) |
| 8 | 4, 5, 7 | #P_mp2an | |- ( CCfld |`s RR ) e. CRing |
| 9 | 3, 8 | #P_eqeltri | |- RRfld e. CRing |
| 10 |  | #P_isfld | |- ( RRfld e. Field <-> ( RRfld e. DivRing /\ RRfld e. CRing ) ) |
| 11 | 2, 9, 10 | #P_mpbir2an | |- RRfld e. Field |
